alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 14 at 10:50PM MST until February 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph producing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, Bone, Wayan, Swan Valley, Victor, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, and Pine Creek Pass * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
